name: Creative Adaptability
description: Tests the model's ability to adapt creative approaches to different contexts and constraints

prompts.text: Create a presentation for a non-profit organization with very limited resources. The presentation needs to explain their community literacy program to potential donors, but must be designed to work without internet access, special equipment, or professional design software. Develop a creative approach that works within these constraints.
expected_elements: Alternative approaches to standard presentation elements

prompts.text: Create a presentation about cybersecurity that can be adapted for three different audiences: 1) Technical IT professionals, 2) C-suite executives, and 3) General employees with minimal technical knowledge. Show how the core content can be creatively adapted for each audience while maintaining the essential security messages.
expected_elements: Innovative ways to present the same information differently

contextual_adaptation.description: Adaptation to different contexts or audiences
